item.title: Simulations Plus Inc 10-K
item.description: Simulations Plus Inc, which is in the Services-Computer Integrated Systems Design [7373] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 28, 2022 had 24525 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: million - 261 instances 31 - 233 instances august - 216 instances company - 204 instances 2022 - 195 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
